tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE soil_contamination_levels (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location GEOMETRY(POINT),
    contamination_level FLOAT,
    sample_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SoilSamples (
    sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location POINT,
    contamination_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE soil_analysis (
   analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   sample_id INT,
   analysis_date DATE,
   analysis_result VARCHAR(50),
   FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES soil_samples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE soil_mapping (
   mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   analysis_id INT,
   mapping_date DATE,
   mapping_result VARCHAR(50),
   FOREIGN KEY (analysis_id) REFERENCES soil_analysis(analysis_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SoilSamples (
  sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location GEOMETRY(POINT),
  contamination_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE SamplingLocations (
  location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Contaminants (
  contaminant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  contaminant_name VARCHAR(255),
  safe_limit FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE AnalysisResults (
  analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id UUID REFERENCES SoilSamples(sample_id),
  contaminant_id UUID REFERENCES Contaminants(contaminant_id),
  analysis_date DATE,
  analysis_result FLOAT
)
